summary: You can now have Farkjorn from Facebook follow you in Skyrim. Basic follower mod. Levels with your character.
descriptionHtml:
If you're a fan of the Dark Brotherhood, Demise of the Dominion or Galmar Stonefist on Facebook, you probably recognize the name Farkjorn. Well, he is now a follower in Skyrim. He can be found in Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.

To install, extract the file and place the ESP file in your Skyrim Data folder.

Have fun!
author: monstermatt1991
